entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:49 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 10:00 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind northwest 80 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 60 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:46 AM ADT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
